short_description: A consciousness-awakening dreamscape simulation — navigate 18 dreamscapes, face your archetypes, and integrate your shadows.
long_description:
GLITCH·PEACE is a psychedelic, trauma-informed consciousness-exploration game built at the intersection of depth psychology, somatic therapy, and cross-cultural mythology.

Navigate 18 procedurally-generated DREAMSCAPES — each a symbolic realm drawn from Jungian archetypes, somatic awareness, and the living world of the imagination. Face the Dragon. Integrate the Shadow. Find sovereignty.

[h2]6 Gameplay Modes[/h2]
[list]
[*][b]Grid Mode[/b] — Strategic tile navigation across a living emotional field. Collect PEACE nodes, avoid shadow tiles, transmute fear into insight.
[*][b]Shooter Mode[/b] — Fast-paced arena survival with BPM-locked rhythm bonuses. Every shot is a breath; every wave a deeper layer.
[*][b]Constellation Mode[/b] — Meditative star-connection puzzle. Trace mythological patterns across the dreamscape sky.
[*][b]Meditation Mode[/b] — Breathing and somatic awareness. No enemies. Just the field, the breath, and the self.
[*][b]Co-op Mode[/b] — Local 2-player shared dreamscape. Navigate together; integrate together.
[*][b]Daily Challenge[/b] — A freshly seeded dreamscape every 24 hours. Compete on the global leaderboard.
[/list]

[h2]Deep Systems[/h2]
[list]
[*]Adaptive difficulty — 5 tiers from gentle to sovereign-level
[*]Multilingual vocabulary learning (12 languages)
[*]Pattern recognition and IQ training integration
[*]Emotional field engine — 10 emotions with coherence and distortion tracking
[*]Lunar temporal system — real-world moon phase modifies gameplay
[*]Jungian archetype system — Dragon, Child, Orb, Captor, Protector
[*]Alchemical transmutation mechanics
[*]Boss encounters with cinematic 3D rendering
[*]Dream Yoga and lucid dreaming mechanics
[*]Cessation and recovery support tools
[*]Biome overlays driven by your live emotional state
[*]Rhythm M7 full note-fall mode with BPM-locked scoring
[/list]

[h2]25 Steam Achievements[/h2]
From First Breath to Philosopher's Stone — every run unlocks something new.

[h2]Steam Deck Verified[/h2]
Full gamepad support. Adaptive full-screen at 720p. Touch d-pad for portable play.
